body: Spring is the season of house tours, and those looking for one of the most unusual might set aside next Sunday for Flatbush, the Brooklyn neighborhood that retains New York City's best selection of large Victorian homes. body: From the thick granite walls of Brooklyn's main library to the former take-out restaurant that is home to the Sedgwick Branch Library in the South Bronx, literacy is taking a beating in New York City's fiscal straits, and libraries are telling sad tales.
